name: 陳怡倩
objective: Main objective of this course is threefold: (1) to provide a review of essential grammar skills to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly; (2) to compose a paragraph that has clearly stated topic sentence with adequate development and appropriate organization; (3) to identify and correct sentence structure and syntactic problems.
schedule:
Week 1	Course introduction
Week 2      Adjective & noun clauses review	
Week 3	Participial phrases & appositive phrases	
Week 4	Sentence combining	
Week 5	Writing Process & Paragraph Structure	
Week 6      Punctuation
Week 7	Mid-term exam	
Week 8	Mid-term review
Week 9      Writing Theme I: narrating	
Week 10	Writing Theme I: Narrating (cont.)	
Week 11	Writing Theme II: Describing	
Week 12	Writing Theme II: Describing (cont.)	
Week 13	Writing Theme III: Explaining	
Week 14	Writing Theme III: Explaining (cont.)	
Week 15	Writing Theme IV: Comparing or Contrasting	
Week 16	Writing Theme IV: Comparing or Contrasting (cont.) 	
Week 17	Final exam	
Week 18	Final exam review
scorePolicy: Active participation & quizzes (15%); Assignments (50%); Mid-term (15%); Final (20%).
materials:
Azar, B.S. & Hagen, S.A. (2016). Understanding and using English grammar (5th ed.). Pearson Education.
